name: Archon of Luck
description:
:

As an adventurer, you are trying to become the archon of luck by going through different stages and acquiring buffs (or debuffs) to your stats through RNG. What you get from chests are completely random and up to fate. You can also get better weapons of different rarities that are also dependent on your luck. Are you lucky enough to take on this challenge in becoming the archon of luck?

CONTROLS:

  • WASD: move around
  • LEFT-CLICK: attack (in the direction you are facing)
  • RIGHT-CLICK: toggle 2.5D camera (on/off)
  • SHIFT: slide/dodge (in the direction you are facing, must have enough stamina)
  • TAB: open inventory and view current stats
  • E: open chests (interact)
